column4: Volatile organic compounds (percentage change from 1990 level)
column7: Fine particulate matter (percentage change from 1990 level)

column1: Note: This indicator reports emissions of 6 key air pollutants from human activities only. It does not include emissions from natural sources such as forest fires and from vegetation. Emissions from black carbon, a component of PM2.5, are also not included.
Source: Environment and Climate Change Canada (2023) Air Pollutant Emissions Inventory (https://www.canada.ca/en/environment-climate-change/services/pollutants/air-emissions-inventory-overview.html).
Available on the Environmental indicators website (www.canada.ca/environmental-indicators).
